attributes.action: ensure that sorn primary school in east ayrshire is not closed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the plan is to close sorn school, littlemill school in rankinson, stxaviers in waterside and also merge castle and cairnhill primaries in new cumnock

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ensure that sorn primary school in east ayrshire is not closed."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14885.asp

Prime Minister's Office
